title: why do i keep getting an account password reset email?
body: I haven't played this game in quite some time. However, I keep getting emails from Riot to change my password. Why would anyone want my account? It's super old.

replies.body: That's interesting, but it sounds like someone is trying to get a hold of it if they're sending password requested.  I recommend going over our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to make sure your info is secure.  You can also reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can get some more context.  See you there!
